title: Transparent Plans and Pricing
subTitle: Assertive's plans are tailored to suit the various needs of developers and teams at different levels - from individual builders to large-scale enterprises.

individualPlan.name: Individual
individualPlan.description: Best for individual developers and small-scale projects
features: Test generation at Class & Method scale

teamsPlan.name: Teams
teamsPlan.description: Best for dev teams and larger scale projects
features: Advanced test generation for entire projects

enterprisePlan.name: Enterprise
features: Advanced test generation for entire enterprise projects
Up to 750k lines of code (with option to purchase more)
